name: 大氣科學概論（含實習）
description: To give an introduction to the observed nature of the atmosphere and its phenomena.
goals: To give an introduction to the observed nature of the atmosphere and its phenomena.
syllabus:
1\. The Earth & Its Atmosphere  
2. Warming the Earth & the Atmosphere  
3. Seasonal & Daily Temperatures  
4. Light, Color, & Atmospheric Optics  
5. Atmospheric Moisture  
6. Condensation (& Deposition): Dew, Fog, and Clouds  
7. Stability and Cloud Development  
8. Precipitation  
9. Air Pressure & Winds  
10. Wind: Small-Scale & Local Systems  
11. Wind: Global Systems (& Short-Range Climate Variability)  
12. Air Masses & Fronts  
13. Middle-Latitude Cyclones

14\. Thunderstorms & Tornadoes

15\. Hurricanes Climate and Climate Change

16\. Climate Change

17\. Global Climate Air Pollution

18\. Air Pollution

19\. Light, Color, and Atmospheric Optics  
  
進度如非預期，得調整之

methodologies.note: 參觀中央氣象局或其他氣象單位(視疫情狀況調整，不一定成行)

grading.note: 作業+課堂練習+小考+參訪報告(視疫情狀況，不一定出外參訪)
